ยง 1407. Powers of the commissioner. In addition to the powers of the
commissioner or the public health council to effectuate the provisions
of this article, the commissioner shall have the power to:
 1. Cooperate with state and federal officials to investigate the
statements made in any statements or solicitation made or filed, and to
promote camp safety standards.
 2. Cooperate with the attorney general in the prosecution of actions
under this article.
 3. Maintain a file open for public inspection and answer any inquiries
concerning any camp regulated by this article.
 4. Establish forms and procedures to secure compliance with this
article.
 5. Publish a list of states which have adopted camp safety standards
and a program of compliance comparable to those of New York.
